titles: The naked mans peace is obedience in a word to the magistrates, priests and people. To which is annexed the will of dead living, and living dead man, now called Nicholas Keate, with a word in generall to all sorts. Written by me Edmund Hide.
author: Hide, Edmund.
publisher: printed, and are to be sold neere Fleet-Bridge,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Punishment --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
